author: kai zhu <kaizhu256@gmail.com>
description: minimal npm installer for phantomjs and slimerjs with zero npm dependencies
name: phantomjs-lite

scripts.test:
node_modules/.bin/utility2 shRun shReadmePackageJsonExport && printf 'testing phantomjs
' && [ $(./index.js phantomjs eval 'console.log("hello")') = 'hello' ] && printf 'passed
' && printf 'testing slimerjs
' && [ $(./index.js slimerjs eval 'console.log("hello")') = 'hello' ] && printf 'passed
'
